-- Generated by Oracle SQL Developer Data Modeler 21.4.1.349.1605
--   at:        2022-03-07 17:48:35 PST
--   site:      Oracle Database 11g
--   type:      Oracle Database 11g

-- predefined type, no DDL - MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY

-- predefined type, no DDL - XMLTYPE

CREATE TABLE account (
    account_number  NUMBER NOT NULL,
    account_type_id NUMBER NOT NULL,
    status_id       NUMBER NOT NULL,
    date_open       DATE,
    date_closed     DATE
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE account ADD CONSTRAINT account_pk PRIMARY KEY ( account_number );

CREATE TABLE account_status (
    status_id    NUMBER NOT NULL,
    status_value VARCHAR2(120)
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE account_status ADD CONSTRAINT account_status_pk PRIMARY KEY ( status_id );

CREATE TABLE "ACCOUNT_TYPE " (
    account_type_id NUMBER NOT NULL,
    account_type    VARCHAR2(120)
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE "ACCOUNT_TYPE " ADD CONSTRAINT account_type_pk PRIMARY KEY ( account_type_id );

CREATE TABLE customer (
    customer_id   NUMBER NOT NULL,
    first_name    VARCHAR2(120),
    last_name     VARCHAR2(120),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    sign_up_date  DATE
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE customer ADD CONSTRAINT customer_pk PRIMARY KEY ( customer_id );

CREATE TABLE customer_account (
    account_number NUMBER NOT NULL,
    customer_id    NUMBER NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE customer_account ADD CONSTRAINT customer_account_pk PRIMARY KEY ( account_number,
                                                                              customer_id );

CREATE TABLE transaction (
    transaction_id       NUMBER NOT NULL,
    transaction_datetime DATE,
    from_account         NUMBER,
    to_account           NUMBER,
    description          VARCHAR2(120)
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE transaction ADD CONSTRAINT transaction_pk PRIMARY KEY ( transaction_id );

ALTER TABLE account
    ADD CONSTRAINT account_account_status_fk FOREIGN KEY ( status_id )
        REFERENCES account_status ( status_id )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE account
    ADD CONSTRAINT "ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT_TYPE _FK" FOREIGN KEY ( account_type_id )
        REFERENCES "ACCOUNT_TYPE " ( account_type_id )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE customer_account
    ADD CONSTRAINT customer_account_account_fk FOREIGN KEY ( account_number )
        REFERENCES account ( account_number )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE customer_account
    ADD CONSTRAINT customer_account_customer_fk FOREIGN KEY ( customer_id )
        REFERENCES customer ( customer_id )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE transaction
    ADD CONSTRAINT transaction_account_fk FOREIGN KEY ( from_account )
        REFERENCES account ( account_number )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE transaction
    ADD CONSTRAINT transaction_account_fkv1 FOREIGN KEY ( to_account )
        REFERENCES account ( account_number )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;
